column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A suspected drunk driver hit a central divider
column4: then a billboard and overturned at about 12:00 am on June 30
column10: a white Ford Ranger ‘Phnom Penh 2BJ-9196’ was driven in a north-to-south direction
column11: speeding. After crashing the driver got out of the car
column12: climbed into another car and escaped.------After the incident
column13: the police came to the scene to contact the traffic specialists who took the car to the traffic office. The Phnom Penh Municipal Commissioner is waiting for the car owner to come forward. ------PPR
